00062 #ifndef MFILE_H
00063 #define MFILE_H
00064 
00065 /* 10/29/02 REK Adding config.h */
00066 #include <config.h>
00067 #include <library/l_alloc_new.h>
00068 #include <stdarg.h>
00069 #define  MAXARGS        100
00070 #include "mbuf.h"
00071 
00072 
00073 typedef struct Mline
00074 {
00075   char *buf;
00076   int len;
00077   int line_no;
00078   struct Mfile *mfile;
00079   struct Mline *next;
00080   struct Mline *prev;
00081 }
00082 Mline;
00083 
00084 typedef struct Mfile
00085 {
00086   char *name;
00087   char *desc;
00088   Mline *head;
00089   Mline *tail;
00090   int line_count;
00091 }
00092 Mfile;
00093 
00094 typedef struct Mptr
00095 {
00096   Mfile *mfile;
00097   Mline *mline;
00098   int pos;
00099 }
00100 Mptr;
